Priest Dominic: None of your business. Your role in task is simply delivery. To find Greymore, talk to *Aquilani*. He stands outside the western entrance of the *Monastery of Silence*. He knows precisely where you'll find Greymore. Yes, simply shoulder this epistle. A task so simple someone such as yourself could not slip up. [Quest _10288_SecretMission 31350-05.htm|Accept the task.]
